name: SullitheDiabetesGuru
0:
”Alexa, open Sulli the Diabetes Guru”
”Alexa, ask Sulli the Diabetes Guru about low blood sugar”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sulli the diabetes guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sulli the Diabetes Guru is here to help those newly diagnosed with diabetes. If that’s you, you’re not alone. It affects more than 27 million Americans. And, because it can be pretty overwhelming, Sulli is ready to answer any questions you may have. 

Sulli does not provide medical advice. You should contact your healthcare practitioner if you have questions about your health or have a medical emergency.
